skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, artifacts, posters, or applications (examples include websites, landing pages, dashboards, React components, HTML/CSS layouts, or when styling/beautifying any web UI). Generates creative, polished code and UI design that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: 7Spade

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only design guidelines and aesthetic principles. No executable code, network calls, file access, or command execution. The content provides instructional guidance for frontend design without any security concerns.

content.value_statement: Generic AI-generated frontend code often looks the same and lacks creative character. This skill guides the creation of unique, memorable interfaces with bold aesthetic choices, proper typography, cohesive color themes, and polished visual details.
actual_capabilities: Create production-grade web components and frontend interfaces
Apply bold aesthetic directions with unique typography and color schemes
Implement CSS animations, motion effects, and micro-interactions
Design cohesive visual layouts with spatial composition and creative backgrounds
Avoid generic AI aesthetics through intentional design choices
Generate React, Vue, or HTML/CSS/JS code for interfaces
limitations: Does not execute or test code in a live environment
Does not integrate with design tools like Figma or Sketch
Cannot access existing design systems or component libraries without user input
Does not provide accessibility auditing or WCAG compliance checking

use_cases.title: Build polished web components
use_cases.description: Create React components, HTML/CSS layouts, or complete web pages with distinctive visual styling.

use_cases.title: Generate UI mockups
use_cases.description: Produce working frontend code for landing pages, dashboards, or application interfaces from design concepts.

use_cases.title: Design web artifacts
use_cases.description: Create posters, promotional pages, or visual web content without coding expertise.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Component Request
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a [component type] for a [purpose] using [framework if specified]. Make it visually striking with unique typography and bold color choices.

prompt_templates.title: Landing Page Design
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a landing page for [product/service]. Use a [specific aesthetic] design with animations, custom fonts, and memorable visual elements.

prompt_templates.title: Dashboard Interface
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a dashboard for [use case] with multiple data visualizations, cohesive theme, and smooth interactions. Avoid generic Bootstrap-like layouts.

prompt_templates.title: Creative Portfolio Piece
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an experimental [component/page] that showcases [theme/idea]. Push creative boundaries with typography, motion, and unexpected visual choices.

output_examples.input: Create a modern landing page for a coffee shop
output: A complete landing page with hero section, animated coffee pour effects, bold typography pairing, warm color palette, scroll-triggered animations, and responsive layout

best_practices: Provide context about the purpose, audience, and brand personality for better design alignment
Specify a clear aesthetic direction or mood to guide creative choices
Request specific frameworks or libraries when integration with existing code is needed
anti_patterns: Asking for generic or template-like designs without distinctive character
Requesting only functional code without any attention to visual impact
Omitting constraints or context that would shape the aesthetic direction

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: React, Vue, HTML/CSS/JS, and other modern frontend frameworks. Specify your framework preference in the prompt.

faq.question: How complex can the designs get?
faq.answer: The skill handles everything from simple components to elaborate pages with advanced animations and effects.

faq.question: Can it work with existing design systems?
faq.answer: Yes, provide your design system tokens, component library, or styling preferences in the request.

faq.question: Is my code data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill only generates code. No data is stored or transmitted outside the AI conversation.

faq.question: Why do designs look different from typical AI output?
faq.answer: The skill explicitly avoids common AI aesthetics like Inter font, purple gradients, and predictable layouts.

faq.question: How is this different from general coding skills?
faq.answer: This skill prioritizes visual design, creative direction, and aesthetic polish over pure functionality.
